title: Companion Approval Guide
content: Companion Approval in Baldur's Gate 3 are the opinions your Companions make based on the choices you make throughout the game. Players can forge deep connections with the various Companions they encounter to have a positive or a negative opinion, these choices can range from acts of heroism to acts of cruelty, and each decision is met with a corresponding reaction from your Companions.
